name: Atronach, Fire
description: Elemental Daedra, commonly known as Atronachs, are highly intelligent daedra often most often summoned by conjurers. They have no kinship or loyalties with any of the Daedric Princes, and serve all of them as they please.
gear: Fire Salts - Counts as Rare Herb

abilities.name: Stoke The Flames
abilities.description: If damaged with Fire-based magic, the inflicted damage instead heals for the dealt amount. Any wounds healed in excess of the threshold, become temporary for the next round.

abilities.name: Melted Weapons
abilities.description: If using Normal Weapons and a Despair or 5 Threat is rolled on an attack against a Fire Atronach, the weapon is consumed by the Atronach’s molten flesh, and destroyed.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Ember
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 5, Crit: 3, Qualities: Burn

abilities.name: Magic Action: Effity
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Engaged, Damage: 5, Crit: 3, Qualities: Burn, Blast 5

name: Atronach, Frost
description: Frost Atronachs are less common, but more imposing to mortals than their fiery rivals. Their form varies, typically depending on the intelligence of the individual Daedra. Some will resemble nothing more than an amalgamation of icy shards, while others resemble men made of ice. They share the Fire Atronach’s hatred, often responding to their threats with action.
gear: Frost Salts - Counts as Rare Herb

abilities.name: Accumulation
abilities.description: If damaged with Frost-based magic, the inflicted damage instead heals for the dealt amount. Any wounds healed in excess of the threshold, become temporary for the next round.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Ice Spike
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YYG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 5, Crit: 3, Qualities: Ensnare

name: Atronach, Storm
description: The rarest and most powerful of the Atronachs, Storm Atronachs feel themselves above the petty squabbling of lesser Daedra. They are hard to control, dangerous, and their form varies as they please it, though typically resembles a collection of stones, laced with stormclouds.
gear: Void Salts - Counts as Exceptional Herb

abilities.name: Rolling Storm
abilities.description: If damaged with Shock-based magic, the inflicted damage instead heals for the dealt amount. Any wounds healed in excess of the threshold, become temporary for the next round.

abilities.name: Stormcloak
abilities.description: Performs a Hard Destruction check to grant itself a Lightning Cloak for one round per success. Targets caught within Engaged ranged of the Atronach must pass a Hard Acrobatics check or suffer 8 Lightning damage.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Storm Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YYYYYG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 4, Qualities: Stun 3

name: Banekin
description: The smallest of all Daedric minions, Banekin resemble miniscule scamps. While they lack size and strength, Banekin seem to have a natural affinity for Shock magic, wielding more magic than the average lesser Daedra. This makes them easy to dispatch, but fairly lethal.

talents.name: Clannfear
talents.description: Clannfears are dinosaur-like Daedra that resemble a lizard with a large, bony crest on their head and a sharp beak and talons. They may represent common, wild animals in Oblivion. Due to their great speed and considerable strength, they are fearsome opponents, especially to weaker travellers. All clannfears rely upon melee attacks using their heads, beaks, and/or claws.
gear: Clannfear Scales - counts as Rare Herb

abilities.name: Jagged Hide
abilities.description: When struck with an Engaged melee attack, attacker must pass an Average (2) Acrobatics check, or suffer 1 Wound (ignoring soak).

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Clannfear, Runt
talents.description: Simply smaller, younger, less intelligent Clannfear, who often attack in packs.
gear: Clannfear Scales - counts as Rare Herb

abilities.name: Jagged Hide
abilities.description: When struck with an Engaged range attack, attacker must pass an Average (2) Acrobatics check, or suffer 1 Wound (ignoring soak).

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Cultist
talents.description: Every Daedric Prince, Aedra, and even some mortals have cults dedicated to them. The members of these cults are tenacious, dedicated, and in some cases ruthless. This cultist profile should be used as a baseline for any cultists, with their highest and lowest attributes traded depending on their patron. (i.e. Personality for Sanguine, or Strength for Boethiah). Skills and equipment can stay the same.
gear: Clothes/Robes matching their cause. Weapons below. Misc gold.

talents.name: Daedroth
talents.description: Daedroths are another type of beast-like Daedra in service to Molag Bal, though are oftentimes found patrolling the realms of Oblivion as wild beasts. They resemble large crocodiles who walk upright. They are vicious, aggressive, and deadly, sporting massive teeth, claws, and powerful fire breath.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Daedroths restore 1 Wound per round.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Dark Seducer, Kiskengo
talents.description: The rank and file of the Mazken forces, Kiskengos are rarely seen outside of the Shivering Isles, and as such few mortals are aware that Dark Seducers are anything but the more powerful, better trained Mazken typically encountered on Mundus.

talents.name: Dark Seducer, Autkendo
talents.description: What cultists and adventurers are more likely to meet is an Autkendo. A mid-level Mazken Sergeant, Autkendos are well trained, well equipped and powerful. Sheogorath often sends them to Mundus to perform errands, and allows them to be summoned.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Autkendo can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Dark Seducer, Grakendo
talents.description: The Generals and Lords of the Mazken forces, Grakendos answer only to the Mad God himself. Having earned their position by climbing a ladder of merit (And a ladder filled with immortals), Grakendos are incredibly powerful, fierce, and well equipped. If an adventurer somehow earns the ire of a Grakendo, they had best be prepared to run.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Grakendo can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Aura of Dementia- When in sight of a Grakendo, targets suffer one Setback to resist any Illusion spell effects.
abilities.description: ra of Dementia- When in sight of a Grakendo, targets suffer one Setback to resist any Illusion spell effects.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Dremora, Caitiff
talents.description: Typically used as rank and file in any Dremora outfit, Caitiffs are the lowest ranking of all Dremora, armed with simple Bound armour and weapons, and given basic training. Despite this, a Caitiff is a serious threat to a mortal combatant, and should not be taken lightly.

talents.name: Dremora, Kynreeve
talents.description: The basic Officer rank in a Dremora military outfit, Kynreeves lead groups of Dremora into battle. Still armed with Bound weapons, they are given more range in abilities, and are better trained. When a Kynreeve takes the field, mortal combatants should consider retreat.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Kynreeve can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Dremora, Valyknaz
talents.description: A true Dremora Lord, Valyknaz are the supreme Lords of Dremora society. Shrouded in pure, hate-forged Daedric Platemail, and wielding jagged, fierce weaponry, a Valyknaz signals the end for most mortals. When a true Lord enters a battle, it has likely already declared victory.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Valyknaz can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Aura of Terror
abilities.description: When a Valyknaz enters combat, all characters who are aware of him, must pass a Hard (3) Cool Fear check.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Golden Saint, Auren
talents.description: Auren are the lowest ranking Aureal. Serving as rank and file, with the lowest grade equipment and training. Auren are rarely, if ever, seen outside of the Shivering Isles. Most males in Aureal society occupy this role.

talents.name: Golden Saint, Aurmokel
talents.description: Aurmokel are the mid-tier Sergeants of the Aureal. When Sheogorath needs to send an agent to Mundus, an Aurmokel is among his options. Well equipped, trained, and highly autonomous, Aurmokel are proud agents of the Mad God.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Aurmokel can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Golden Saint, Pelaurig
talents.description: The great Generals and Lords of the Aureal, Pelaurig are adorned with the finest golden armour, weapons, and training. Having earned their position and desirous of keeping it, they refuse to be defeated in battle. Ever self-confident, and perhaps more arrogant than any other Aureals, Pelaurig are easy to anger, and easier to fall to.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Pelaurig can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an ally.

abilities.name: Aura of Mania- When in sight of a Pelaurig, allies may suffer 1 Strain to gain a Boost to their next action.
abilities.description: ra of Mania- When in sight of a Pelaurig, allies may suffer 1 Strain to gain a Boost to their next action.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Spark
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1

abilities.name: Magic Action: Lightning Ball
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GGG) Difficulty: Hard Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 3, Qualities: Stun 1, Blast 4

talents.name: Harvester
talents.description: From the waist up, these servants of Molag Bal resemble four-armed women, adorned in jagged black plate. Their lower half, however, resembles a giant snake, about 8 feet long. Tasked with the gathering the souls Molag Bal feels he has earned, these dangerous Daedra wield blue flame magic, razor sharp claws, and vicious weapons.

abilities.name: Rapid Strikes
abilities.description: Spend 1 Story Point to gain an additional action for one round.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Blueflame
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 4, Qualities: Burn 3

talents.name: Hunger
talents.description: Hungers are thin skinned Daedra, almost anorexic looking. They have a long tongue, sticking out of an always open round mouth. Typically regarded as minion of Boethiah, Hungers are often found in the service of Sheogorath, as he regards them fondly as pets. Hungers attempt to feed on their prey while they are alive, latching on with their sucker-like mouth and draining them.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Should a Hunger successfully bite a target, it can spend an action on its next round consuming the life force of the victim, draining 3 Wounds per round. It must remain attached to the target, and cannot attack anyone else, or the effect ends.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Blueflame
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 4, Qualities: Burn 3

talents.name: Lurker
talents.description: Lurkers are large daedric creatures that guard the murky waters of Hermaeus Mora's realm of Apocrypha. They appear as amphibious humanoids who serve their Prince by guarding forbidden knowledge. Lurkers use their long legs for stomping attacks, and can attack from afar by spewing tentacles from their mouths.

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.description: When out of combat, a Lurker can submerge itself fully into any body of water, no matter how deep. As a maneuver, it can emerge again.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Blueflame
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 4, Qualities: Burn 3

talents.name: Ogrim
talents.description: These are enormous Daedra with very little intellect, but which are chiefly sent into the mortal world to menace living things for the amusement of the Daedric Prince Malacath. Hefty, with thick hide and an immunity to Normal Weapons, Ogrim are rightfully feared.

abilities.name: Body Slam
abilities.description: Spend 1 Story Point to add Endurance to the damage of one melee attack.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Blueflame
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 6, Crit: 4, Qualities: Burn 3

talents.name: Scamp
talents.description: One of the lesser sentient Daedra of Oblivion, Scamps often enter into the mortal world to cause mischief and carry out errands for their Princes. They are weak, rather unintelligent, cowardly, and are easily defeated except in large numbers. They are most commonly associated with Mehrunes Dagon.

talents.name: Seeker
talents.description: Seekers are grotesque tentacled daedra. They are servants of Hermaeus Mora, usually guarding tomes of forbidden knowledge. Seekers have the power to banish prey with sound attacks. They are rarely seen outside the Apocrypha.

abilities.name: Submerge
abilities.description: When out of combat, a Seeker can submerge itself fully into any body of water, no matter how deep. As a maneuver, it can emerge again.

abilities.name: Horror Story
abilities.description: Once per round, Seeker may choose to use the Horror Story Action. A target within Medium range must pass a competing Fear check against the Seeker’s Illusion skill, or suffer fear effects.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Firebolt
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(GG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Damage: 5, Crit: 4, Qualities: Burn 3

talents.name: Spider Daedra
talents.description: These Daedra appear as giant spiders with human torsos, and are associated with Mephala. They are so fiercely independent, deceptive and irrational that not even Mephala's worshippers will often summon them, for fear that they will disobey orders. They are some of the more powerful Daedra, with high intelligence, combat prowess, and magical ability.

talents.name: Winged Twilight
talents.description: Described as both beautiful and grotesque, Winged Twilight resemble an attractive woman with long, bat-like wings in place of arms, and dusky blue-grey skin. Oftentimes mistaken as Harpies, Twilights serve Azura as messengers and agents.

abilities.name: Soar
abilities.description: Once per encounter, a Winged Twilight adopts the Flier attribute, with a speed of 3. This lasts for one round.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Stunning Gaze
abilities.description: Skill: Destruction(Will)(YGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Effects: Target is Staggered for one round.

abilities.name: Magic Action: Summon Lesser Daedra
abilities.description: Skill: Conjuration(Int)(YYGG) Difficulty: Average Range: Medium, Effects: Summon 1 Minion Daedra within Medium range, persisting for one round per Success, unless a maneuver is spent on Concentration.

talents.name: Xivilai
talents.description: Xivilai are highly intelligent Daedra that look like tall and muscular gray-skinned warriors. They are similar in many points to the Dremora, but do not have a caste system. Their lack of a caste system fits perfectly with their hatred of subordination and tendency for betrayal. They are immensely strong, and gifted with magic.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: As a maneuver, Valyknaz can grant Boost dice to the next action performed by an allied Caitiff or Kynreeve.

abilities.name: Aura of Terror
abilities.description: When a Valyknaz enters combat, all characters who are aware of him, must pass a Hard (3) Cool Fear check.
